name: beast-ball
effect: Used in battle : Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon. If the wild Pokémon is an Ultra Beast, this ball has a catch rate of 5×. Otherwise, it has a catch rate of 0.1×. If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
flavor_text: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.
